reviews.review_text: I was looking for an interesting challenge and I found it! I melted my brain trying to figure out how to avoid being seen by myself! this game is awesome! I hope to play it in vr soon!

This is quite a challenging game, putting some classic puzzles into a futuristic setting. The real difficulty involves moving strategically while you do the puzzles so that past versions of yourself don't see a future version.  I get motion sick very easily but found that by using keyboard and mouse instead of the controller I was able to play comfortably for much longer, so I'm glad it was an option.
